increasing until work sleeve front sleeve with markers to note the location measures 4 25 4 5 5 5 5 6 6 5 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 9 5 of the raglan seams where all the increasing will take 10 10 5 11 12 13 14 from the cast on edge in the place the bor is located in the centre of the back back section where the bor is section divide for sleeves german short row are worked symmetrically back and forth to lower the front neckline *k to marker remove marker put sleeve sts all sts between this point and the next marker onto stitch short row 1 rs *k to 1 st before marker m1r k1 holders or scrap yarn remove marker co 8 8 8 8 10 sm k1 m1l repeat from * once more k 1 1 2 2 sts 10 10 12 12 12 14 14 16 18 20 20 20 20 sts for turn work underarm using backwards loop rejoin in the round repeat from * once more k to end of round short row 2 ws wyif sl1 purlwise ds p to bor sm *p to 1 st before marker m1lp p1 sm p1 m1rp 120 132 144 156 168 180 192 204 216 228 240 repeat from * once more p 1 1 2 2 sts turn work 8 252 264 288 312 336 360 384 sts on the needles sts increased in row 1 + 2 body short row 3 rs wyif sl1 purlwise ds k to bor sm *k to 1 st before marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l repeat k all sts until body measures 4 5 5 5 5 6 5 8 5 10 5 from * once more k to ds and knit both loops as if 1 st 12 5 13 13 14 14 15 16 17 18 18 18 18 from k2 turn work the underarm or 1 5 1 5 for all child sizes 2 for all adult sizes less than the total desired length short row 4 ws wyif sl1 purlwise ds p to bor sm *p to 1 st before marker m1lp p1 sm p1 m1rp switch to smaller circular needles repeat from * once more p to ds and purl both loops as k1 p1 around for 1 5 1 5 for all child sizes 2 for if 1 st p2 turn work 8 sts increased in row 3 + 4 all adult sizes repeat short row 3 & 4 another 0 1 1 2 2 3 3 4 4 bind off all sts loosely in rib 5 5 6 6 6 6 7 7 7 more times return
